name: Tiny Man's Revenge
description:
Billionaire Tim Martin, known by many as "Tiny Man", had an unfortunate encounter with a blue-collar worker who turned out to be a notorious villain.

As a result, Tim not only lost his soup but also his height, leaving him vulnerable and exposed.

It was a humbling experience for the once-arrogant businessman, and he couldn't help but wonder what other surprises life had in store for him if had had his soup.
Despite his setback, Tim vowed to bounce back stronger and wiser, determined to reclaim his throne in the world of his delicious treat.


Tim Martin shrugs off his loss of height but cries over his lost soup.
He embarks on an epic adventure into an innocent, yet sinister man's house,
using his skills in Glide, Climb, and Dodge to steal everything he can.
With his haul, he hopes to afford his beloved soup once again.

Tiny Man's Revenge is an action-packed game where you play as a tiny person with the goal of stealing everything in a house.
Realistic movements make the gameplay immersive, and multiple endings depend on your decisions throughout.
The game provides a thrilling experience with its action-oriented gameplay and gives you the freedom to play as you want.
